text: <@U038DUUV3GE> yeah, did all that. But I was able to get it working by cloning the repo that HubSpot provides of an example oauth login/API call, then tweaking it to do what I needed for this use case
Not 100% sure why it didn't work before, but it's working now so :man-shrugging:
Is the HubSpot chargify app open source?
